name: illustrated art print from + copy of Gertie's Book for Better Sewing
description:
I had so much fun with this book researching vintage fashion illustrations and photography, perusing textiles and learning how to sew practically everything. The result is a collection of vintage inspired modern fashion illustrations. - Sun Young Park

Print size is 8x10 on Hahnmuhle archival paper, 285gsm. Ultrachrome archival ink. Each print will be clip framed. 

+ 

copy of Gertie's Book for Better Sewing by Gretchen Hirsch, illustrated by Sun

name: orion constellation embroidery kit
description:
The iconic Orion constellation is the newest addition to my popular line of Zodiac Embroidery Kits. But, these kits are larger (from 4" hoop to a 5", which = more stars!) and on a darker blue cotton fabric.

Orion, the hunter, is one of most easily recognizable constellations, because of his bright "belt" of stars. Each pattern is a true representation of the stars in the night sky and pre-printed for you so you can start stitching right away. No transferring or tracing needed!

This kit gives you everything you need to complete a 5" diameter Orion Constellation Embroidery...

KIT INCLUDES
+ Simple instructions with stitch guide
+ ONE pre-printed Orion pattern on cotton fabric
+ embroidery needle
+ one full skein of yellow DMC cotton embroidery thread (If you'd like white thread instead- just let me know!)
+ 5" wooden embroidery hoop

LEVEL:
Some embroidery experience would be good for this kit, but is not necessary.

PROJECT TIME
This project is one to take your time with. You can get lost making little french knots and stars. Approximate time varies, but to complete the pre-printed pattern can take a few hours.

Jessica Marquez, Miniature Rhino

name: woodgrain tag necklace
description:
cast recycled silver woodgrain tag from old barn door | 16" sterling ball chain

Jacque Schiller, triggerhappy

name: oakes salvage framed photograph
description:
While driving through Vermont this roadside junk shop sign caught my eye. While I saw no real evidence of a salvage business here, I'm a sucker for hand drawn typography.

Framed dye based digital archival print.
framed size 8.75"x875"

Amy Rowan, click & pixel

name: feather and twigs framed photograph
description:
I found this natural still life on a small weathered bench at my friend's alpaca farm. I believe it's from a woodpecker.

Framed dye based digital archival print. 
Framed size 9.75x9.75"

Amy Rowan, click & pixel
